dmca.title: Economics Texts A Rivalrous Good When it Comes to Wikipedia's Use
dmca.body:
Hello,

My name is [redacted]. I’m the Support Manager at Apex Learning. We I have been informed that there are numerous instances of our copyrighted content that has been posted to your site. As these posting are in direct conflict with our Copyrights I ask that you please remove them from your site as quickly as possible. Please accept the following as our formal request for removal.

Pursuant to 17 USC 512(c)(3)(A), this communication serves as a statement that:
I am the duly authorized representative of the exclusive rights holder for Apex Learning’s content.

These exclusive rights are being violated by material available upon your site at the following URLs:

commmons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:1.5.2_ECONOMICs.pdf
commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:2.3.5_ECONOMICs.pdf
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/4b/4.4.4_ECONOMICs.pdf

I have a good faith belief that the use of this material in such a fashion is not authorized by the copyright holder, the copyright holder's agent, or the law;

Under penalty of perjury in a United States court of law, I state that the information contained in this notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on the behalf of the exclusive rights holder for the material in question;

I may be contacted by the following methods: [redacted] Seattle, WA 98161; [redacted]; [redacted]

I hereby request that you remove or disable access to this material as it appears on your service in as expedient a fashion as possible. Thank you.

Regards,
[redacted]
 
[redacted] | Support Manager
Apex Learning | [redacted] | Seattle, WA 98161
Toll Free: [redacted] Office Direct: [redacted] Fax: [redacted]
Email:[redacted]
 www.ApexLearning.com
